## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Name of the icon to use in the badge                                     | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the icon. Possible values: `x-small`, `small`, `medium`, `large` | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                 | Description                                     |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| `--background-color` | The color to use for the badge behind the icon. |
